title: Jessye Norman's Christmastide
brief_description: In Ely Cathedral, diva Jessye Norman sings this moving collection of Christmas songs, backed by the American Boychoir, Ely Cathedral Choristers, Vocal Arts Chorus and the Bournemouth Symphony Orchestra. The songs featured are “O Come, O Come Emmanuel”, “Once in Royal David’s City”, “Unto Us a Child is Born”, “Hark! the Herald Angels Sing”, “Good Christian Men Rejoice”, “O Holy Night”, “The Holly and the Ivy”, “See Amid the Winter Snow”, “I Saw Three Ships”, “Jessye’s Carol”, “Coventry Carol”, “In the Bleak Midwinter”, and “Silent Night”.
